name: Ball Blocker
description:
A classic game with many things to edit, like the color the backgrounds, and also the ball and the paddle, meaning you can change the feel of the game.



The AI is pretty good at keeping up at giving you a good fight which only makes the game more fun to play; there is also a two player mode to play with a friend.



Over all I really like the idea that went into this game, taking an old game and making it new again is great.



I recommend at one point in your life to play this game.



I hope everyone has fun playing it. We have a great time playing here and I hope you will as well.
